ActionsFacade - Class in lu.uni.geko
A utility class following the facade design pattern to grant access to all commands.
Individual plug-ins should not access the functionality of other plug-ins directly if the functionality is also accessible for the user.
ActionsFacade() - Constructor for class lu.uni.geko.ActionsFacade
Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

addAvElementsToWovenModel(Advice, AdviceEffectuation, FeatureEquivalenceHelper, URI) - Method in interface lu.uni.geko.weaver.add.MightyAdderExt
Tries to add the advice elements that have to be added during the given advice effectuation using the information from the given advice, the given feature equivalence helper and the given URI of the woven model.

Attention: The extension has to make sure that, as side-effect, the advice elements that have successfully been added are removed from the set of remaining advice elements to be added.
